Index.siteWelcomeText: Hi! Welcome to my personal CV page

personal.title: Personal
personal.myDreamPositionDesc: Committed to working as a Maintenance Technician, with experience in the technical industry. Thanks to the skills acquired in previous positions, I know how to function in a large team to achieve our goals together.
personal.legal: I agree to the processing of personal data provided in this document for realising the recruitment process pursuant to the Personal Data Protection Act of 10 May 2018 (Journal of Laws 2018, item 1000) and in agreement with Regulation (EU) 2016/679 of the European Parliament and of the Council of 27 April 2016 on the protection of natural persons with regard to the processing of personal data and on the free movement of such data, and repealing Directive 95/46/EC (General Data Protection Regulation).

interests.title: Interests
interests.text: I am interested in new technologies, electronics, and technical devices. I follow current trends in technological innovation and passionately explore the operation of modern electronic systems. Working in a technical environment is a source of satisfaction and additional motivation for my professional development.
